data.name: Terraria Gamepedia - Dark Mode - Simplified
data.description: A simplified "brute force" dark mode for the Terraria Gamepedia

data.name: Venk's Clean PubMed
data.description: This cleans up the 2020 PubMed update.

data.name: OWA365 Debrander 2
data.description: Extends "OWA365 Debrander" with colour overrides and also replaces inject logo with pictures of kittens

data.name: Expand Images (New Twitter)
data.description:
Expands single images on Twitter so you don't have to click on them to view in full.
Works only in the New Layout (2020)

data.name: Trello Jobs Board
data.description: This spotless Trello layout gets rid of all the clunkiness, while preserving the very essential Trello workflow. The styles are based on "Trello clean" by Manu Morante and "Trello: label as top border (with text)" by Samuel Dellicour.

data.name: Busuu Night Translation
data.description:
I like to use Busuu at night, so I translated it to night mode! This took me a few hours, so please enjoy, and good luck learning!

If I find anything that looks wrong I'll do my best to fix it.

data.name: webmailer 7.10.1 - dunkel - ox.hosteurope.de.
data.description: dunkle version für den host europe webmailer OpenXchange 7. Dieser Style Funktioniert am besten mit dem HostEurope Theme auswählen, dieses ist standardmäßig vorausgewählt. (Einstellungen > Grundeinstellungen > Design > HostEurope Theme)

data.name: Dark Green Youtube
data.description:
-Tone down the whites to a glowy green color.
-Reds are softer too.
-Much better search bar.
-Adding some nice tweaks.

Works better when logged in & turning on dark mode.

data.name: Busuu Clean Japanese Font
data.description: Changes the ugly pixelated-looking Japanese font to be that of Meiryo.

data.name: Better Removeddit
data.description: This style changes removeddit's design drastically. Licensed under the ISC License. Bugs? Ideas? Criticism? Contact me!
